title: ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Miami Masters Women's Singles Results
text: March 24, 2018 / 1:32 AM / Updated 19 hours ago ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Miami Masters Women's Singles Results Reuters Staff 2 Min Read Mar 24 (OPTA) - Results from the ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Miami Masters Women's Singles matches on Friday .. 2nd Round .. 3-Garbine Muguruza (ESP) beat Amanda Anisimova (USA) (Walkover) 6-Jelena Ostapenko (LAT) beat Timea Babos (HUN) 6-4 6-4 Beatriz Haddad Maia (BRA) beat 31-Shuai Zhang (CHN) 6-3 6-2 Sofia Kenin (USA) beat 19-Daria Kasatkina (RUS) 3-6 6-2 6-2 9-Petra Kvitova (CZE) beat Aryna Sabalenka (BLR) 7-5 3-6 6-3 Petra Martic (CRO) beat 15-Kristina Mladenovic 3-6 6-4 6-2 (FRA) 21-Ashleigh Barty (AUS) beat Claire Liu (USA) 6-0 7-6(0) 26-Daria Gavrilova (AUS) beat Andrea Petkovic (GER) 7-6(3) 6-4 4-Elina Svitolina (UKR) beat Naomi Osaka (JPN) 6-4 6-2 8-Venus Williams (USA) beat Natalia Vikhlyantseva 7-5 6-4 (RUS) 29-Kiki Bertens (NED) beat Varvara Lepchenko (USA) 5-7 7-6(5) 6-1 22-Elise Mertens (BEL) beat Bernarda Pera (USA) 7-6(5) 6-3 11-Johanna Konta (GBR) beat Kirsten Flipkens (BEL) 6-4 6-3 Danielle Collins (USA) beat 16-Coco Vandeweghe (USA) 6-3 1-6 6-1 Donna Vekic (CRO) beat 24-Elena Vesnina (RUS) 6-3 6-7(4) 6-1 Maria Sakkari (GRE) beat 28-Anett Kontaveit (EST) 6-4 6-1
